description:
PuTTY is a free implementation of Telnet and SSH for Windows and Unix platforms, along with an xterm terminal emulator.
	This modified PuTTY version (by Jakub Kotrla) stores sessions information to a folder and not to the registry.
summary: PuTTY-Sessions Folder is a modified version of PuTTY. The session information are stored in files not in the registry
author: Jakub Kotrla / Simon Tatham
